PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-05722003-04-30,  HERITAGE,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Arts Centre Act
PrecisRe-appointment of DAVID LEIGHTON of Komoka, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Arts Centre Corporation to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective May 4, 2003.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Re-appointment of DAVID LEIGHTON of Komoka, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Arts Centre Corporation to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective May 4, 2003.
